Photo / Alex Burton

Jetstar misplaces luggage of passengers travelling from Auckland to Australia for Christmas https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/jetstar-misplaces-luggage-of-passengers-travelling-from-auckland-to-australia-for-christmas/IXJYTK2CORA77CWL2MXDOEFSHE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/jetstar-misplaces-luggage-of-passengers-travelling-from-auckland-to-australia-for-christmas/IXJYTK2CORA77CWL2MXDOEFSHE/ Ben TomsettA grandmother has been left without her medication and presents for her grandkids. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 04:47:41 +0000 Jetstar has apologised to affected customers who flew to Australia after their luggage, including toiletries and Christmas presents, was left at Auckland Airport. Photo / Max, Unsplash
